endpoints.description: Retrieve the current status and health metrics of all monitored machinery.
Schedule a maintenance task for a specific machinery unit based on predictive analysis.
Retrieve detailed reports of past machinery failures and their causes.
Set up custom notifications for specific maintenance thresholds.
Update the warning and critical thresholds for machinery parameters.
Retrieve a predictive analysis for potential machinery failures within a specified time frame.
Submit and track issues identified by operators for review.
Retrieve the history of sent alerts and their acknowledgments.
Update the descriptive metadata associated with machinery units.
